comment: Too specific? Cereal?;  also possible: crop=hop
grows on special palms; too general?
source data only has fibres, but that does not matter; or: trees=agave
Wiki-EN: “Peach and nectarines are the same species, even though they are regarded commercially as different fruits.”
A hybrid, basically the same, does not matter here anyway
or: trees=palms; wrong syntax?;  theoretically: trees=palm_trees
Note different spelling (cf.: trees=cacao_trees); both spellings possible, but tag used here is more common in OSM
could also be mapped each one under: trees=mandarin_trees
